quotes.name: Quote 1
quotes.text: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.

quotes.name: Quote 2
quotes.text: Believe you can and you're halfway there.

quotes.name: Quote 3
quotes.text: Don't watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.

quotes.name: Quote 4
quotes.text: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.

quotes.name: Quote 5
quotes.text: It always seems impossible until it's done.

quotes.name: Quote 6
quotes.text: Life is 10% what happens to us and 90% how we react to it.

quotes.name: Quote 7
quotes.text: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.

quotes.name: Quote 8
quotes.text: In the middle of difficulty lies opportunity.

quotes.name: Quote 9
quotes.text: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today.

quotes.name: Quote 10
quotes.text: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.

quotes.name: Quote 11
quotes.text: Your time is limited, don't waste it living someone else's life.

quotes.name: Quote 12
quotes.text: Life is what happens when you're busy making other plans.

quotes.name: Quote 13
quotes.text: Do not wait to strike till the iron is hot, but make it hot by striking.

quotes.name: Quote 14
quotes.text: I find that the harder I work, the more luck I seem to have.

quotes.name: Quote 15
quotes.text: Don't cry because it's over, smile because it happened.

quotes.name: Quote 16
quotes.text: The best way to predict the future is to create it.

quotes.name: Quote 17
quotes.text: Happiness is not by chance, but by choice.

quotes.name: Quote 18
quotes.text: Success is stumbling from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.

quotes.name: Quote 19
quotes.text: If you want to achieve greatness stop asking for permission.

quotes.name: Quote 20
quotes.text: The only person you are destined to become is the person you decide to be.

quotes.name: Quote 21
quotes.text: You miss 100% of the shots you don't take.

quotes.name: Quote 22
quotes.text: Do not take life too seriously. You will never get out of it alive.

quotes.name: Quote 23
quotes.text: The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.

quotes.name: Quote 24
quotes.text: It's not whether you get knocked down, it's whether you get up.

quotes.name: Quote 25
quotes.text: You have within you right now, everything you need to deal with whatever the world can throw at you.

quotes.name: Quote 26
quotes.text: The only thing standing between you and your goal is the story you keep telling yourself as to why you can't achieve it.

quotes.name: Quote 27
quotes.text: Be not afraid of life. Believe that life is worth living, and your belief will help create the fact.

quotes.name: Quote 28
quotes.text: The purpose of our lives is to be happy.

quotes.name: Quote 29
quotes.text: Life is really simple, but we insist on making it complicated.

quotes.name: Quote 30
quotes.text: The only true wisdom is in knowing you know nothing.

quotes.name: Quote 31
quotes.text: Don't count the days, make the days count.

quotes.name: Quote 32
quotes.text: It's not what happens to you, but how you react to it that matters.

quotes.name: Quote 33
quotes.text: The best revenge is massive success.

quotes.name: Quote 34
quotes.text: The greatest wealth is to live content with little.

quotes.name: Quote 35
quotes.text: In three words I can sum up everything I've learned about life: it goes on.

quotes.name: Quote 36
quotes.text: To live is the rarest thing in the world. Most people exist, that is all.

quotes.name: Quote 37
quotes.text: You only live once, but if you do it right, once is enough.

quotes.name: Quote 38
quotes.text: Life is really simple, but we insist on making it complicated.

quotes.name: Quote 39
quotes.text: The purpose of our lives is to be happy.

quotes.name: Quote 40
quotes.text: Life is what happens when you're busy making other plans.

quotes.name: Quote 41
quotes.text: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.

quotes.name: Quote 42
quotes.text: In the middle of difficulty lies opportunity.

quotes.name: Quote 43
quotes.text: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today.

quotes.name: Quote 44
quotes.text: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.

quotes.name: Quote 45
quotes.text: Your time is limited, don't waste it living someone else's life.

quotes.name: Quote 46
quotes.text: Do not wait to strike till the iron is hot, but make it hot by striking.

quotes.name: Quote 47
quotes.text: I find that the harder I work, the more luck I seem to have.

quotes.name: Quote 48
quotes.text: Don't cry because it's over, smile because it happened.

quotes.name: Quote 49
quotes.text: The best way to predict the future is to create it.

quotes.name: Quote 50
quotes.text: Happiness is not by chance, but by choice.
